verbose_text: However, beta-catenin in hTERT -/low CSCs was cytoplasmic, whereas hTERT high CSCs showed nuclear beta-catenin (XREF_FIG B), suggesting aberrant activation of beta-catenin in hTERT high CSCs, which indicates that hTERT functions by activating the beta-catenin pathway.
evidence: hTERT functions by activating the beta-catenin
